text: Ohe yara imana enecha! Tomara nabira gharaguloya prabesa karo na tomadera khanapinara jan'ya anumati na de'oya hale -- rannabanna sesa habara apeksa na kare, baram yakhana tomadera daka haya takhana tomara prabesa karo, tarapara yakhana tomara kheye niyecha takhana cale ye'o, ebam garimasi karo na bakyalapera jan'ya. Nihsandeha e'isaba nabike kasta diye thake, athaca tini sankoca bodha karena tomadera jan'ya, kintu allah satya sanbandhe sankoca karena na. Ara yakhana tomara tadera kache kono-kichu ca'o takhana pardara arala theke tadera kache ca'ibe. Eti'i adhikatara pabitra tomadera hrdayera jan'ya ebam tadera hrdayera jan'ye'o.
